user_query: I'm writing a book and need some character inspiration. Can you provide me with the zodiac signs list? Additionally, I would like to search for tweets about writing and get the contributions made by Geeklist users in the literature category.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of zodiac signs for character inspiration.
Search for tweets related to writing to gather inspiration and ideas.
Retrieve contributions from Geeklist users specifically in the literature category.
